channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Plex redesigns its app to look more like a streaming service
item.description: Streaming service and media software maker Plex on Friday introduced a redesign of its software that puts more emphasis on discovery, easily accessing...

item.title: Tesla Superchargers: GM, Ford, Rivian, and other EV brands with access
item.description: EV owners of GM vehicles like the Chevrolet Silverado EV and Cadillac Lyriq will now officially have access to Tesla’s Superchargers. © 2024 TechCrunc...

item.title: Bluesky Says It Won’t Screw Things Up
item.description: The not-a-Twitter-clone is exploding, and its CEO promises to not repeat old social-media mistakes. Her strategy? Massively empower users to decide ho...

item.title: Why Is It So Tricky to Show the Sun, Earth, and Moon in a Diagram?
item.description: In a nutshell, you can get the distances or the sizes right, but not both. Space is hard!

item.title: 12 Best Computer Speakers (2024): Affordable, Soundbar, Surround Sound, Gaming
item.description: These WIRED-tested computer speakers, from stereo speakers to surround sound, will suit any budget.

item.title: Best Natural Sleep Aids (2024), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: I tested an array of alternative sleep aids, from CBD capsules to mushroom chocolate to bath bombs, to see if they would help my chronic insomnia.

item.title: EU closes antitrust probe into Apple’s e-book and audiobook rules after complaint withdrawn

item.title: Taking a cue from X, Threads tests AI-powered summaries of trending topics
item.description: As the Twitter-like social network Bluesky sees a significant surge in users this month, Meta’s own X competitor Threads has been rapidly building out...

item.title: Battery unicorn Northvolt files for bankruptcy, co-founder and CEO resigns
item.description: The company chose Chapter 11 in an effort to right its listing finances. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: The Best Star Wars Gifts for Everyone From Padawans to Jedi Masters
item.description: These are the best Star Wars gifts for everyone from Padawan fans to Jedi masters.
